N = int(input())
change = 1000 - N % 1000 if N % 1000 != 0 else 0

N = int(input())

change = 1000 - (N % 1000) if N % 1000 != 0 else 0

print(change)

import sys

N = int(input())

# get the number of 5-yen coins
num_of_coins = N // 5

# get the amount of change
change = 5 * num_of_coins - N

print(change)

import sys

N = int(input())

# get the number of 1000-yen bills
num_of_bills = N // 1000

# get the amount of change
change = 1000 * num_of_bills - N

print(change)
